alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Red River; Titus (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 10:25PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Franklin, northwestern Titus and southern Red River Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1024 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bogata, or 7 miles north of Hagansport, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boxelder, Bogata, Wilkerson, Deport, Talco, Harts Bluff, Johntown, and Cuthand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
